channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
So I've added my code into Client.java
[code] PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 91; //Armour and Weapons } else if (NPCID == 2537) { [/code]
and then I added my code into shops.cfg
[code] shop = 1 Armour and Weapons 2 2 4151 100 4587 100 4598 100 [/code]
And my npc is in npcs.cfg
So when I try and talk to him... He doesn't trade me. :( Please help
